scripts.testpostpublish1: echo "pushing tag: ${npm_package_version}" && git tag ${npm_package_version} && git push origin ${npm_package_version}
scripts.testpostpublish2: node -e "process.stdout.write(require('./package.json').version);" | xargs git tag && node -e "process.stdout.write(require('./package.json').version);" | xargs git push origin
